tbusinessl: Prasac Microfinance Institution Ltd is a provider of consumer lending services. The Company was founded in August 2004 and is located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
comments: Couldn't find "Investor Group" on S&P. Company website says it's sole shareholder is KB Financial, which is a South Korean Company. No shareholders/owners are listed on Orbis.

comments: S&P gives Capetown HQ location. Orbis gives NL HQ location. LinkedIn shows that Arise appears to have a signficant number of staff based in Netherlands. Company website lists Capetown before Amsterdam as two locations and specifies African focus.

tbusinessl: Mobility i Tap Pay (Bangladesh) Ltd provides mobile financial services to the banked and unbanked population through NFC Card, NFC Tag, Apps, IVR etc. The Company is a is a sister concern of Mobility Group. Having Meghna Bank Ltd. as banking partner. The Company was founded in November 2015 and is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
comments: S&P, Orbis, and company website give Malaysia HQ location.

abusinessl: Nord Anglia Education Inc, located in Central, Hong Kong, owns and operates international premium schools. It teaches children from kindergarten through the end of secondary school (K-12) at its 27 premium schools in China, Europe, the Middle East and Southeast Asia (ME/SEA) and North America. As of March 11, 2014. The Company has schools by 1,980 places, developed two greenfield 3,000 places and acquired 19 schools with a total of 11,364 places. On May 22, 2013, the Company purchased 100% interest of WCL Group Limited and acquired its 11 schools in North America, the Middle East and Europe.
tbusinessl: The British School Yangon is a school operator. The Company is located in Yangon, Myanmar.
comments: An S&P search for Nord Anglia gives Bach Financial as parent, incorporated in Caymans. S&P shows Nord Anglia HQ in HK, company website show HQ in UK.

abusinessl: Finalify Ltd is a commodity contracts dealer. The Company is engage in cryptocurrency exchange & trading. It operates under the brand name Bankera. The Company is located in Tortola, the British Virgin Islands.
tbusinessl: Pacific Private Bank Ltd is a commercial bank. The Company was founded in 1997 and is located in Port Vila, Vanuatu.
comments: Finalify appears to be same company as Bankera, according to S&P, which appears to be Lithuania based after browing leadership team on company website and location of staff via LinkedIn. Company appears to be Lithuanian based on LinkedIn staff locations for Bankera and other news items.

comments: Very difficult to ascertain true parent. However, the purchases of AP Towers Myanmar by AP Towers Holding Singapore seems like a tax optimization transaction. S&P gives Singapore address.
